title: Turkey's grand canal sows fears among villagers
text:
Turkey's grand canal sows fears among villagers 11:50am BST - 02:07
A 28 mile canal that will redraw the map of Europe's biggest city, Istanbul, is among President Erdogan's most ambitious mega-projects but the plans are causing concern among locals and environmentalists. Emily Wither reports from Istanbul.
A 28 mile canal that will redraw the map of Europe's biggest city, Istanbul, is among President Erdogan's most ambitious mega-projects but the plans are causing concern among locals and environmentalists. Emily Wither reports from Istanbul. //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/05/13/turkeys-grand-canal-sows-fears-among-vil?videoId=426496049&videoChannel=13422
